io.werval.spi.server

Class HttpServerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.werval.spi.server.HttpServerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpServer 

    public abstract class HttpServerAdapter
extends Object
implements HttpServer
    Base class to write HttpServer implementations.

    Primary responsibility is error handling across lifecycle.

    See HttpServerHelper for composable helper methods to use in implementations.
